name: Horse Rave Simulator - BurningMare 2020
description:
Earlier this year, I was invited to perform a DJ set for a virtual rave called BurningMare. This was a virtual rave environment I designed to accompany my mix, Enjoy watching it run in realtime on your fancy PC.

Does not currently run well in 4K.

Controls: Press space to connect to TsunkoLive
